Rulings.Cat:
● 'Dark Crusader's' effect is an Ignition Effect. Sending 1 DARK monster from your hand to the GY is a cost.
● Any ATK gained with 'Dark Crusader's' effect is applied until it is flipped face-down or removed from the field.
